sql.query:
SELECT ISNULL(SUM(SECTOR_AM), 100000000) FROM MONTHLY_FUND_STK_INDUSTRY a, FUND_MASTER b WHERE a.FUND_CD=b.FUND_CD AND a.SECTOR_CD='I.001' AND a.DT=(SELECT MAX(DT) FROM MONTHLY_FUND_STK_INDUSTRY WHERE DT <=? AND SECTOR_CD='I.001') AND CLASS_CD= ?
at isolation 0

INSERT INTO #jusik1(SECTOR_CD, CLASS_CD, SECTOR_AM_SUM) SELECT SECTOR_CD, CLASS_CD, AVG(SEC_STOCK_MKT_WG) FROM MONTHLY_FUND_STK_INDUSTRY a, FUND_MASTER b WHERE a.FUND_CD = b.FUND_CD AND a.DT=(SELECT MAX(DT) FROM MONTHLY_FUND_STK_INDUSTRY a, FUND_MASTER b WHERE a.FUND_CD = b.FUND_CD AND DT <=? AND CLASS_CD = ?) AND CLASS_CD = ? AND SECTOR_CD in ( 'I.005', 'I.006', 'I.007', 'I.008' , 'I.009' , 'I.010' , 'I.011', 'I.012', 'I.013', 'I.014' , 'I.015' , 'I.016', 'I.017', 'I.018', 'I.019' , 'I.020' , 'I.021', 'I.022', 'I.023', 'I.024' , 'I.025' , 'I.026' ) GROUP BY SECTOR_CD, CLASS_CD
SET ROWCOUNT 5
SELECT d.IndustNm, a.SEC_STOCK_MKT_WG, CASE WHEN b.MKT_RATIO = NULL THEN 0 ELSE b.MKT_RATIO END, c.SECTOR_AM_SUM FROM MONTHLY_FUND_STK_INDUSTRY a, MONTHLY_BM_ANL b, #jusik1 c, FAMASTER.dbo.FAA_STK_INDUSTRY_INFO d WHERE a.DT=(SELECT MAX(DT) FROM MONTHLY_FUND_STK_INDUSTRY WHERE DT <=? AND SECTOR_CD='I.001') AND b.DT=(SELECT MAX(DT) FROM MONTHLY_FUND_STK_INDUSTRY WHERE DT <=? AND SECTOR_CD='I.001') AND a.FUND_CD=? --AND a.FUND_CD = c.FUND_CD AND a.SECTOR_CD=c.SECTOR_CD AND a.SECTOR_CD in ( 'I.005', 'I.006', 'I.007', 'I.008' , 'I.009' , 'I.010' , 'I.011', 'I.012', 'I.013', 'I.014' , 'I.015' , 'I.016', 'I.017', 'I.018', 'I.019' , 'I.020' , 'I.021', 'I.022', 'I.023', 'I.024' , 'I.025' , 'I.026' ) AND a.SECTOR_CD=b.BM_CD AND a.SECTOR_CD=d.IndustCd ORDER BY a.SEC_STOCK_WG DESC
at isolation 0
SET ROWCOUNT 0

create table #jusik1 (
SECTOR_CD char(7) null, CLASS_CD char(13) null, SECTOR_AM_SUM numeric(27,20) null )
